CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.delete_gift_list(p_gift_list_id uuid, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- Verify if the gift list exists and is not already deleted
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM giftlists WHERE id = p_gift_list_id AND is_deleted = FALSE) THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'Gift list not found or already deleted';
    END IF;

    -- Mark the gift list as deleted and set delete_date
    UPDATE giftlists
    SET is_deleted = TRUE,
        delete_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    WHERE id = p_gift_list_id;

    -- Log activity
    PERFORM log_activity(p_user_id, 'delete_giftlist', p_gift_list_id, NULL);
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.update_unassigned_gifts_to_pending()
 RETURNS TABLE(updated_gift_id uuid, previous_state text, new_state text)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    pending_state_id INT;
BEGIN
    -- Obtener el ID del estado 'pending'
    SELECT id INTO pending_state_id FROM giftstates WHERE name = 'pending';

    -- Actualizar los regalos y devolver información sobre los cambios
    RETURN QUERY
    WITH updated_gifts AS (
        UPDATE gifts g
        SET state_id = pending_state_id
        WHERE g.state_id IN (SELECT id FROM giftstates WHERE name IN ('bought', 'reserved'))
          AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM giftusers gu WHERE gu.gift_id = g.id)
          AND g.is_deleted = FALSE
        RETURNING g.id, g.state_id AS previous_state_id
    )
    SELECT 
        ug.id AS updated_gift_id,
        gs_prev.name::text AS previous_state,
        'pending'::text AS new_state
    FROM updated_gifts ug
    JOIN giftstates gs_prev ON ug.previous_state_id = gs_prev.id;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.assign_user_to_gift(p_gift_id uuid, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, giftlist_id uuid, name text, description text, link text, website text, price numeric, currency text, state text, assigned_users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_current_state INTEGER;
    v_giftlist_id UUID;
BEGIN
    -- Verificar si el regalo existe y no está eliminado
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM gifts WHERE gifts.id = p_gift_id AND is_deleted = FALSE) THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'Gift not found or already deleted';
    END IF;

    -- Verificar si el usuario ya está asignado al regalo
    IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM giftusers WHERE giftusers.gift_id = p_gift_id AND giftusers.user_id = p_user_id) THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'User is already assigned to this gift';
    END IF;

    INSERT INTO giftusers (gift_id, user_id)
    VALUES (p_gift_id, p_user_id);

    SELECT gifts.state_id, gifts.giftlist_id INTO v_current_state, v_giftlist_id
    FROM gifts
    WHERE gifts.id = p_gift_id;

    IF v_current_state = 1 THEN
        UPDATE gifts
        SET state_id = 2
        WHERE gifts.id = p_gift_id;
    END IF;

    -- Log activity
    PERFORM log_activity(p_user_id, 'assign_gift', v_giftlist_id, p_gift_id);

    -- Return updated gift data
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        g.id,
        g.giftlist_id,
        g.name::text,
        g.description::text,
        g.link::text,
        g.website::text,
        g.price,
        g.currency::text,
        gs.name::text AS state,
        (
            SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(
                jsonb_build_object(
                    'userId', u.id::text, 
                    'name', u.name::text, 
                    'email', u.email::text
                )
            ), '[]'::jsonb)
            FROM giftusers gu
            JOIN users u ON gu.user_id = u.id
            WHERE gu.gift_id = g.id
        ) AS assigned_users
    FROM gifts g
    JOIN giftstates gs ON g.state_id = gs.id
    WHERE g.id = p_gift_id;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.update_gift(p_gift_id uuid, p_name text, p_description text, p_link text, p_website text, p_price numeric, p_currency text, p_state text, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, giftlist_id uuid, name text, description text, link text, website text, price numeric, currency text, state text, assigned_users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
  v_state_id INT;
  v_state_name TEXT;
  v_giftlist_id UUID;
BEGIN
  -- Verificar si el regalo existe y no está eliminado
  IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM gifts WHERE gifts.id = p_gift_id AND is_deleted = FALSE) THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'Gift not found or already deleted';
  END IF;

  -- Get the state id
  SELECT gs.id INTO v_state_id
  FROM giftstates gs
  WHERE gs.name = p_state;

  -- Update the gift
  UPDATE gifts g
  SET
    name = COALESCE(p_name, g.name),
    description = COALESCE(p_description, g.description),
    link = COALESCE(p_link, g.link),
    website = COALESCE(p_website, g.website),
    price = COALESCE(p_price, g.price),
    currency = COALESCE(p_currency, g.currency),
    state_id = COALESCE(v_state_id, g.state_id),
    modification_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  WHERE g.id = p_gift_id
  RETURNING g.giftlist_id INTO v_giftlist_id;

  -- Log activity
  PERFORM log_activity(p_user_id, 'edit_gift', v_giftlist_id, p_gift_id);

  -- Get the state name
  SELECT gs.name INTO v_state_name
  FROM giftstates gs
  WHERE gs.id = COALESCE(v_state_id, (SELECT g.state_id FROM gifts g WHERE g.id = p_gift_id));

  -- Return the updated gift
  RETURN QUERY
  SELECT 
    g.id,
    g.giftlist_id,
    g.name::TEXT,
    g.description::TEXT,
    g.link::TEXT,
    g.website::TEXT,
    g.price,
    g.currency::TEXT,
    v_state_name AS state,
    COALESCE(
      (SELECT 
        jsonb_agg(json_build_object('userId', u.id, 'name', u.name, 'email', u.email))
       FROM giftusers gu
       JOIN users u ON gu.user_id = u.id
       WHERE gu.gift_id = g.id),
      '[]'::jsonb
    ) AS assigned_users
  FROM gifts g
  WHERE g.id = p_gift_id;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_assigned_gifts_by_user_id(p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, giftlist_id uuid, name text, description text, link text, website text, price numeric, currency text, state text, assigned_users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
  RETURN QUERY
  SELECT 
    g.id,
    g.giftlist_id,
    g.name::TEXT,
    g.description::TEXT,
    g.link::TEXT,
    g.website::TEXT,
    g.price,
    g.currency::TEXT,
    gs.name::TEXT AS state,
    (
      SELECT jsonb_agg(json_build_object('userId', u.id, 'name', u.name, 'email', u.email))
      FROM giftusers gu
      JOIN users u ON gu.user_id = u.id
      WHERE gu.gift_id = g.id
    ) AS assigned_users
  FROM 
    gifts g
  JOIN 
    giftusers gu ON g.id = gu.gift_id
  JOIN 
    giftstates gs ON g.state_id = gs.id
  WHERE 
    gu.user_id = p_user_id
    AND g.is_deleted = FALSE;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_gifts_by_list_id(list_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, giftlist_id uuid, name text, description text, link text, website text, price numeric, currency text, state text, assigned_users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
  RETURN QUERY
  SELECT 
    g.id,
    g.giftlist_id,
    g.name::TEXT,
    g.description::TEXT,
    g.link::TEXT,
    g.website::TEXT,
    g.price,
    g.currency::TEXT,
    gs.name::TEXT AS state,
    COALESCE(
      (SELECT 
        jsonb_agg(json_build_object('userId', u.id, 'name', u.name, 'email', u.email))
       FROM giftusers gu
       JOIN users u ON gu.user_id = u.id
       WHERE gu.gift_id = g.id),
      '[]'::jsonb
    ) AS assigned_users
  FROM 
    gifts g
  JOIN 
    giftstates gs ON g.state_id = gs.id
  WHERE 
    g.giftlist_id = list_id
    AND g.is_deleted = FALSE
  ORDER BY 
    g.creation_date ASC;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_gift(p_giftlist_id uuid, p_name text, p_description text, p_link text, p_website text, p_price numeric, p_currency text, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, giftlist_id uuid, name text, description text, link text, website text, price numeric, currency text, state text, assigned_users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
  v_new_gift_id UUID;
  v_state_name TEXT;
BEGIN
  -- Verificar si la lista de regalos existe
  IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM giftlists WHERE giftlists.id = p_giftlist_id) THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'Gift list not found';
  END IF;

  -- Insert the new gift
  INSERT INTO gifts (
    giftlist_id,
    name,
    description,
    link,
    website,
    price,
    currency,
    state_id,
    creation_date
  )
  VALUES (
    p_giftlist_id,
    p_name,
    p_description,
    p_link,
    p_website,
    p_price,
    p_currency,
    1, -- Assuming 1 is the initial state (e.g., 'pending')
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  )
  RETURNING gifts.id INTO v_new_gift_id;

  -- Get the state name
  SELECT giftstates.name INTO v_state_name
  FROM giftstates
  WHERE giftstates.id = 1;

  -- Log activity
  PERFORM log_activity(p_user_id, 'create_gift', p_giftlist_id, v_new_gift_id);

  -- Return the created gift
  RETURN QUERY
  SELECT 
    g.id,
    g.giftlist_id,
    g.name::text,
    g.description::text,
    g.link::text,
    g.website::text,
    g.price,
    g.currency::text,
    gs.name::text AS state,
    '[]'::jsonb AS assigned_users
  FROM gifts g
  JOIN giftstates gs ON g.state_id = gs.id
  WHERE g.id = v_new_gift_id;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.unassign_user_from_gift(p_gift_id uuid, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, giftlist_id uuid, name text, description text, link text, website text, price numeric, currency text, state text, assigned_users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_remaining_users INTEGER;
    v_giftlist_id UUID;
BEGIN
    -- Verificar si el regalo existe y no está eliminado
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM gifts WHERE gifts.id = p_gift_id AND gifts.is_deleted = FALSE) THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'Gift not found or already deleted';
    END IF;

    -- Verificar si el usuario está asignado al regalo
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM giftusers WHERE giftusers.gift_id = p_gift_id AND giftusers.user_id = p_user_id) THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'User is not assigned to this gift';
    END IF;

    -- Obtener el giftlist_id antes de eliminar la asignación
    SELECT gifts.giftlist_id INTO v_giftlist_id
    FROM gifts
    WHERE gifts.id = p_gift_id;

    -- Eliminar la asignación del usuario
    DELETE FROM giftusers
    WHERE giftusers.gift_id = p_gift_id AND giftusers.user_id = p_user_id;

    -- Contar cuántos usuarios quedan asignados a este regalo
    SELECT COUNT(*) INTO v_remaining_users
    FROM giftusers
    WHERE giftusers.gift_id = p_gift_id;

    -- Si no quedan usuarios asignados, volver al estado 'pending' (1)
    IF v_remaining_users = 0 THEN
        UPDATE gifts
        SET state_id = 1
        WHERE gifts.id = p_gift_id;
    END IF;

    -- Registrar la actividad
    PERFORM log_activity(p_user_id, 'unassign_gift', v_giftlist_id, p_gift_id);

    -- Return updated gift data
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        g.id,
        g.giftlist_id,
        g.name::text,
        g.description::text,
        g.link::text,
        g.website::text,
        g.price,
        g.currency::text,
        gs.name::text AS state,
        COALESCE(
            (
                SELECT jsonb_agg(
                    jsonb_build_object(
                        'userId', u.id::text, 
                        'name', u.name::text, 
                        'email', u.email::text
                    )
                )
                FROM giftusers gu
                JOIN users u ON u.id = gu.user_id
                WHERE gu.gift_id = g.id
            ),
            '[]'::jsonb
        ) AS assigned_users
    FROM gifts g
    JOIN giftstates gs ON gs.id = g.state_id
    WHERE g.id = p_gift_id;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.update_gift_list(p_gift_list_id uuid, p_name text, p_description text, p_date timestamp with time zone, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, name text, description text, date timestamp with time zone, modification_date timestamp with time zone, users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
  UPDATE giftlists
  SET name = p_name,
      description = p_description,
      date = p_date,
      modification_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  WHERE giftlists.id = p_gift_list_id;

  -- Log activity
  PERFORM log_activity(p_user_id, 'edit_giftlist', p_gift_list_id, NULL);

  RETURN QUERY 
  SELECT 
    gl.id, gl.name::TEXT, gl.description::TEXT, gl.date::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
    gl.modification_date::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
    jsonb_agg(json_build_object('userId', u.id, 'name', u.name, 'email', u.email, 'role', r.name)) AS users
  FROM giftlists gl
  JOIN giftlistusers glu ON gl.id = glu.giftlist_id
  JOIN users u ON glu.user_id = u.id
  JOIN roles r ON glu.role_id = r.id
  WHERE gl.id = p_gift_list_id
  GROUP BY gl.id, gl.name, gl.description, gl.date, gl.modification_date;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_and_associate_gift_list(p_list_name text, p_list_description text, p_list_date timestamp with time zone, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, name text, description text, date timestamp with time zone, creation_date timestamp with time zone, users jsonb)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    new_gift_list_id UUID;
BEGIN
  INSERT INTO giftlists (name, description, date, creation_date)
  VALUES (p_list_name, p_list_description, p_list_date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
  RETURNING giftlists.id INTO new_gift_list_id;

  INSERT INTO giftlistusers (giftlist_id, user_id, role_id)
  VALUES (new_gift_list_id, p_user_id, 1);

  -- Log activity
  PERFORM log_activity(p_user_id, 'create_giftlist', new_gift_list_id, NULL);

  RETURN QUERY 
  SELECT 
    gl.id, gl.name::TEXT, gl.description::TEXT, gl.date::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
    gl.creation_date::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
    jsonb_agg(json_build_object('userId', u.id, 'name', u.name, 'email', u.email, 'role', r.name)) AS users
  FROM giftlists gl
  JOIN giftlistusers glu ON gl.id = glu.giftlist_id
  JOIN users u ON glu.user_id = u.id
  JOIN roles r ON glu.role_id = r.id
  WHERE gl.id = new_gift_list_id
  GROUP BY gl.id, gl.name, gl.description, gl.date, gl.creation_date;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_gift_lists_from_user(userid uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, name text, description text, date timestamp with time zone, users jsonb, is_owner boolean)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
  RETURN QUERY
  SELECT 
    gl.id,
    gl.name::TEXT,
    gl.description::TEXT,
    gl.date::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
    jsonb_agg(
      jsonb_build_object(
        'userId', u.id, 
        'name', u.name, 
        'email', u.email, 
        'role', r.name
      ) ORDER BY u.name
    ) AS users,
    bool_or(glu.user_id = userid AND r.name = 'owner') AS is_owner
  FROM 
    giftlists gl
  JOIN 
    giftlistusers glu ON gl.id = glu.giftlist_id
  JOIN 
    users u ON glu.user_id = u.id
  JOIN 
    roles r ON glu.role_id = r.id
  WHERE 
    gl.id IN (
      SELECT giftlist_id 
      FROM giftlistusers 
      WHERE user_id = userid
    )
    AND gl.is_deleted = FALSE
  GROUP BY 
    gl.id
  ORDER BY
    gl.date DESC;
END;
$function$
